import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; // Import useContext import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from './AdminSidebar.module.css'; import { SidebarContext } from '../Side/SidebarContext'; // Import SidebarContext const AdminSidebar = () => { const { isSidebarOpen, setActiveTab, activeTab } = useContext(SidebarContext); // Access the context // Function to handle click event on tab const handleTabClick = (tabName) => { setActiveTab(tabName); }; return (
  • handleTabClick('home')}>
    home Home
  • handleTabClick('AddUser')}>
    person_add Add User
  • handleTabClick('UpdateUser')}>
    manage_accounts Update User
  • handleTabClick('DeleteUser')}>
    person_remove Delete User
); } export default AdminSidebar;
